product_name: REI Silk Long-Sleeve Crew Shirt - Men's Tall
long_description: Lightweight and supple, the REI Silk long-sleeve crew shirt provides great warmth for its weight and offers luxurious comfort. Lightweight, breathable, pure silk jersey is enhanced with a wicking treatment and dries quickly to help keep you warm and comfortable. Dropped back hem stays tucked in. Rib-knit finish on neck and cuffs. Machine wash warm on gentle cycle without bleach or fabric softeners, tumble dry low.
short_description: Lightweight and supple, the REI Silk long-sleeve crew shirt provides great warmth for its weight and offers luxurious comfort.
